X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The total number of requests in a given time window.

bank_id.description: The bank id related to this expense

invoice_currency_id.description: The currency id of the related invoice

currency_id.description: The currency id of the expense

recurring_expense_id.description: The related recurring expense this expense was created from

private_notes.description: The private notes of the expense

public_notes.description: The public notes of the expense

transaction_reference.description: The transaction references of the expense

transcation_id.description: The transaction id of the expense

foreign_amount.description: The total foreign amount of the expense

exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate at the time of the expense

payment_date.description: The date of payment for the expense, format Y-m-d

should_be_invoiced.description: Flag whether the expense should be invoiced

is_deleted.description: Boolean determining whether the expense has been deleted

invoice_documents.description: Passing the expense documents over to the invoice

calculate_tax_by_amount.description: Flag indicating whether to calculate tax based on amount rather than percentage

category_id.description: The unique identifier of the expense category

number.description: The unique number assigned to this expense

purchase_order_id.description: The unique identifier of the associated purchase order

tax_amount1.description: The amount of the first tax

tax_amount2.description: The amount of the second tax

tax_amount3.description: The amount of the third tax

transaction_id.description: The unique identifier of the transaction

uses_inclusive_taxes.description: Flag indicating whether taxes are included in the price

vendor_id.description: The unique identifier of the vendor associated with this expense

message.description: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
message.example: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
